sentences.en: A crown is emblematic of royalty.
Along the way, Hyundai has become emblematic of the changes sweeping Korea's economy.
sentences.cn: 现代所走的路成了整个韩国经济的象征性变化.

sentences.en: EXAMPLE : The rapid sales of cell phones in our country is emblematic of our new prosperity.
sentences.cn: 我国手机销售的快速增长反映出新的繁荣.

sentences.en: In some works, flowers take on a powerful emblematic quality.
sentences.cn: 在一些作品中，花具有强烈的象征意义。

sentences.en: Pen - Emblematic of the liberal art of writing and of learned employments.
sentences.cn: 钢笔 - 学术自由的象征.

sentences.en: The steady accumulation of tension is emblematic of le Carr é at his finest.
sentences.cn: 这种紧张感的层层递增正是勒·卡雷最佳创作水准的典型体现.

sentences.en: The violence is emblematic of what is happening in our inner cities.
sentences.cn: 这种暴力行为正标示了我们市中心贫民区的状况。

sentences.en: They are emblematic of what I would call single - species conservation: ie a focus on one animal.
sentences.cn: 它们是单一物种保护的象征: 即,侧重于一种动物.

sentences.en: This is the emblematic sculpture of Yingkou.
sentences.cn: 这就是营口的标志性雕塑了.

words.tran_cn: 象征；用符号表示；用纹章装饰

trans.tran_cn: 象征的，可当标志的，象征性
trans.tran_en: seeming to represent or be a sign of something
